verbs.description: [ARG0: Microsoft staff] [V: wrote] [ARG2: to CEO Satya Nadella] calling on the firm to cancel its $ 19.4 million deal with the US 's Immigration , Customs and Enforcement agency . They are dismayed at Donald Trump 's policy , in which families and children are separated after crossing the US - Mexico border illegally .
